page.title: 19-Chilton Farms-Alden,Manor-
page.content: Mr.Bucknell bought{Alden Farm}in 1938. He has 41 fields, which cover 395 hectares.He employs 4 people full-time and 12 people part-time.He grows wheat, barley,oil seed rape,tick beans and peas. He also keeps cows and chickens, and occasionally pheasants.He uses the following machinery; tractors, ploughs, harrows and cultivators.He has storage barns to store the cattle food he grows - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - {The Manor Farm},totally arable, is managed by Mr.Backhouse. It is very large,with 210 acres in this block.Mr. Backhouse uses fungicides,insecticides, pesticides and growth regulators to produce high grade crops, chiefly cereals.The 3 fields in this area are called Farm Road, Fingerpost and In The Downs Next The Gallops. They all have winter oats in them. Farm Road is 79 acres. Fingerpost is 76 acres.
